attention2.ptxt: Do not disassemble EGR valve, or original performance will be spoiled.

s1.ptxt: Check EGR valve for the following.
If malfunction is found, replace EGR valve.

item.ptxt: Check EGR valve for wear and damage.
Check EGR valve operates smoothly by opening EGR valve fully by hand.

s1.ptxt: Check resistance of EGR valve as follows.
If malfunction is found, replace EGR valve.

s2.ptxt: Check resistances between terminal “1” and terminal “2” as specified value.

spec.title: EGR valve resistance between terminals “1” and “2”:

s2.ptxt: Check resistance between terminals “1” and “3” varies depending on EGR valve opening.

s1.ptxt: Check EGR valve operation by ECM signal as follows.

s2.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Connect EGR valve connector (1) to EGR valve (2).
Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Check EGR valve opens and closes each approx. 10 times repeatedly and automatically after turning ignition switch to OFF position.
If EGR valve does not operate at all, go to next step.
If EGR valve operates correctly, EGR valve is in good condition.

s1.ptxt: Check pulse signal for EGR valve as follows.

s2.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Measure operating pulse signal between terminal “4” and terminal “6” of EGR valve connector using oscilloscope after turning ignition switch to OFF position.
If pulse signal shown in figure can be measured, replace EGR valve.
If not, check connection and wiring harness between EGR valve and ECM.
